skills.Name: Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 and M. Atk. by 1.9.

skills.Name: Robe Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 1.7 when equipped with a robe.

skills.Name: Anti Magic
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 20 and Magic Damage Resistance by 5%.

skills.Name: Higher Mana Gain
skills.Description: Increases the recovery rate when MP is being recovered by recharge.

skills.Name: Boost Mana
skills.Description: Increases Max MP by 30.

skills.Name: Blaze
skills.Description: Ignites flames on your body with 13 Power, inflicting Fire damage on the enemy.

skills.Name: Solar Spark
skills.Description: Inflicts holy damage on the enemy with 15 Power added to M. Atk. Over-hit.

skills.Name: Mana Regeneration
skills.Description: Sacrifices HP to regenerate 6% of MP.

skills.Name: Curse Weakness
skills.Description: Decreases the enemy's P. Atk. by 17% for 30 seconds.

skills.Name: Curse Poison
skills.Description: Poisons the enemy, causing loss of 11 HP every 3 seconds for 30 seconds.

skills.Name: Summon Kat the Cat
skills.Description: Summons Kat the Cat. Consumes 1 Spirit Ore when summoning.

skills.Name: Magical Bind
skills.Description: Blast the surrounding area with magic causing 16 Magical Damage and binding the target for 5 seconds.

skills.Name: Servitor Heal
skills.Description: Recovers 15% of the servitors HP.

skills.Name: Servitor Recharge
skills.Description: Recovers 30% of the servitor's MP.

skills.Name: Mighty Servitor
skills.Description: Increases the servitor's P. Atk. by 8% for 20 minutes.

skills.Name: Servitor Physical Shield
skills.Description: Increases the servitor's P. Def. by 8% for 20 minutes.

skills.Name: Servitor Wind Walk
skills.Description: Increases the servitor's Speed by 20 for 20 minutes.
